use.flag: Build plugin to support playing MOD music aka tracker music through libopenmpt

Build plugin to support MPRIS. needs systemd/elogind or basu USE flags. MPRIS (Media Player Remote Interfacing Specification) is a standard D-Bus interface which aims to provide a common programmatic API for controlling media players.
Build plugin to support MPRIS using systemd.
Build plugin to support MPRIS using elogind.
Build plugin to support MPRIS using basu.
